title: Miso Soup with Shiitake Mushrooms Recipe
description: This delicious Japanese soup features with Shiitake mushrooms and tofu.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Soup Recipes Miso Soup with Shiitake Mushrooms 4.4 (35) 27 Reviews 9 Photos A delicious Japanese miso soup with shiitake mushrooms and tofu. Submitted by Claudia Updated on July 29, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 9 9 9 9 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 10 mins Total Time: 20 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 4 cups vegetable broth 4 shiitake mushrooms, thinly sliced ¼ cup miso paste 4 teaspoons soy sauce ⅓ cup diced firm tofu 2 green onions, trimmed and thinly sliced Directions Heat vegetable broth to a boil in a saucepan. Add mushrooms; reduce heat to low, and simmer 4 minutes. Whisk miso paste and soy sauce together in a small bowl; stir into broth along with tofu and continue cooking 1 minute more. Divide soup among bowls; top with green onions to serve. I Made It Print 50 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 92 Calories 3g Fat 12g Carbs 6g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 92 % Daily Value * Total Fat 3g 3% Saturated Fat 0g 2% Sodium 1406mg 61% Total Carbohydrate 12g 4% Dietary Fiber 2g 9% Total Sugars 5g Protein 6g 11% Vitamin C 2mg 2% Calcium 109mg 8% Iron 2mg 13% Potassium 93mg 2% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Add Your Photo Photos of Miso Soup with Shiitake Mushrooms 01 of 09 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 09 Photo by  AlbertN_Jr 03/13/2021 Amazing Recipe! Makes enough for even the hungriest of people! 03 of 09 Photo by  Bethanne Street 06/12/2019 Added wakame seaweed, turned out great. 04 of 09 Photo by  chadsqui 02/09/2019 Simply delicious , and healthy. I followed the instructions and added Bak Choy . Yum ! Highly recommend 05 of 09 Photo by  Leah Wiley 12/10/2017 06 of 09 Photo by  Anchor85 05/22/2017 it was SO good, salty, warm, comforting. Family and friends liked it 07 of 09 Photo by  Yadontneed2no 09/17/2015 So good and so quick! I've made it twice so far. The first time, I accidentally put way too much soya sauce so it was good but a little too salty. I also didn't have Miso paste. The second time though, I had Miso paste and I didn't overdo the soya sauce. It was DELICIOUS! I made several additions to the recipe though. I don't like tofu so I replaced it with thin pieces of beef. I also added udon and every vegetable I could find in my fridge/freezer. What a hearty, healthy and tasty soup it made! Definitely a meal on it's own if you make it the way I did. Even with all that, it didn't take me more than about 25-30 min to make (including boiling/simmering time). I highly recommend this for people with little time on their hands. I doubled the recipe and froze half for days where there's just no time to cook. 08 of 09 Photo by  lilbadpinay 01/16/2015 It's a great miso base recipe! You can customized this soup to your liking..I've been looking for a good miso broth and this one is perfect! I added veggies to mine. I used bokchoy, watercress, potato, 3 types of mushrooms (I love it in my soup) enoki,portabello and white and I used udon noodles! Season to your liking, if it needs more salt, then do so! Topped it with green onions then served piping hot! 09 of 09 Photo by  Alyonushka 09/10/2013 Easy and quick to cook, taste very delicious. 1 You’ll Also Love Japanese Soup with Tofu and Mushrooms 22 Ratings Spicy Miso Soup with Roasted Shiitake Mushrooms and Green Beans 6 Ratings Japanese Onion Soup 118 Ratings Quick Miso Soup Asian Mushroom Soup 100 Ratings Traditional Beef Sukiyaki 2 Ratings Vegan Miso Soup 3 Ratings Roasted Mushroom and Sunchoke Bisque 17 Ratings Butternut Squash-Sweet Potato Ginger Bisque 55 Ratings Vegetarian Nori Miso 1 Rating Mushroom and Barley Soup 11 Ratings Authentic Miso Soup 35 Ratings Vegan Mushroom and Kale Soup 1 Rating Instant Pot Chicken Miso Soup 42 Ratings Barley, Lentil, and Mushroom Soup 111 Ratings Summer Soup of Butternut and Corn 30 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Claudia
instructions: Heat vegetable broth to a boil in a saucepan. Add mushrooms; reduce heat to low, and simmer 4 minutes.;Whisk miso paste and soy sauce together in a small bowl; stir into broth along with tofu and continue cooking 1 minute more. Divide soup among bowls; top with green onions to serve.
